name: New Super Mario Bros. Android
description:
Join Mario for solo fun anytime, anywhere! Take part in a side scrolling adventure for the whole family as you try to save the mushroom kingdom. New Super Mario Bros. Android harder and faster.

4 WORLDS
80 LEVELS
GREAT SOUNDTRACK

Simple, straightforward controls optimized for younger and less experienced players make this a perfect choice for anyone looking to introduce their family to the wonderful world of Mario. All a gamer needs is a Samsung ™.
